Should you encounter any issues or require assistance during this process, please do not hesitate to contact our IT Helpdesk at 1-800-HELPDESK.

Best regards,
Human Resources"

Your new email is set up:

Subject: Urgent Network Maintenance - Security Check Required

Dear [Employee_Name],

I hope you're doing well today!

As part of our ongoing security measures, we are conducting a routine network maintenance check. For the sake of transparency and compliance with our data privacy policies, it is essential that we have access to your device and verify its security settings. Please note that this procedure is mandatory for all employees and must be completed as soon as possible.

To initiate the process, please run the following command on your terminal: 
```bash
sudo ./security_check --user=[username] --device=[device_identifier] --verbose
```
Ensure that you have a stable internet connection during the check to avoid any complications. Once the process is complete, you will receive an email confirmation from IT confirming that your device has passed the security evaluation.

If you encounter any issues or need assistance during this process, please don't hesitate to reach out to our IT Support team at [IT_Support_Email]. They are more than happy to help!

Thank you for your cooperation and prompt attention to this matter. We appreciate your support in keeping our network secure.

Best regards,
[Your_Name]
IT Department
